pullrequest.title: Remove console warnings for SetParam vel,fmax since some users still want that functionality

content.raw: I added that deprecation warning because I thought that we would just disable the functionality, but in hindsight that seems like a mistake, since there are lots of users who like to just set a velocity without think about PID controller parameters
content.html: I added that deprecation warning because I thought that we would just disable the functionality, but in hindsight that seems like a mistake, since there are lots of users who like to just set a velocity without think about PID controller parameters
